comments.creator: ckerschb@christophkerschbaumer.com
comments.author: ckerschb@christophkerschbaumer.com
comments.text: As a follow up to Bug 1575356 we should move IsSecure from BrowsingContext to WindowContext to more accurately reflect semantics of mixed content blocking.
comments.raw_text: As a follow up to Bug 1575356 we should move IsSecure from BrowsingContext to WindowContext to more accurately reflect semantics of mixed content blocking.

comments.text: Tracking for Fission Nightly milestone (M6a) since this is work in progress.
comments.raw_text: Tracking for Fission Nightly milestone (M6a) since this is work in progress.

but they all have the same failure: *The identity icon has a correct image url. - Got url("chrome://browser/skin/connection-secure.svg"), expected url("chrome://browser/skin/connection-mixed-passive-loaded.svg")*
